Docs.summary: 包含支援 Windows Forms 和 WPF 控制項互通的類別。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration>命名空間包含類別，可讓之間的互通性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技術。 當您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration>類別，您可以裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]上的控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]頁面，並[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-架構應用程式。
實作交互操作功能的兩個主要類別是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>。 使用的類別取決於您的控制項實作：
- 使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>類別時，您必須使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]頁面。
- 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>類別時，您必須使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]為基礎的應用程式。
